DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of combat , add #b1 #yupgraded #yGold #yEmpty to hand.

ColorfulMod:ShinyGoldCard.NAME: Shiny Gold Card

ColorfulMod:GoldenEgg.NAME: Golden Egg
ColorfulMod:GoldenEgg.FLAVOR: Is it laid by a golden hen?
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you add a card with " #yGold " or " #yGolden " in its name, #yupgrade it.

ColorfulMod:MoneyBag.NAME: Money Bag
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you play a #yGold card , gain #b7 #ygold.

ColorfulMod:MimeticPaint.NAME: MimeticPaint
ColorfulMod:MimeticPaint.FLAVOR: Magical paint that can make things invisible.
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you play a #ycolored card , gain #b1 Block.

ColorfulMod:LightBulb.NAME: Light Bulb
ColorfulMod:LightBulb.FLAVOR: The author has ran out of inspiration.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of combat , gain #b1 #yInspiration.

ColorfulMod:BottledInspiration.NAME: Bottled Inspiration
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you play a #b0 cost card , gain #b1 temporary #bInspiration this turn (at most #b3 ).

ColorfulMod:MagicStar.NAME: Magic Star
DESCRIPTIONS: #yGold Evoke Effect triggers twice , but Strengthen Effect of other cards no longer triggers when you play a Gold card.

ColorfulMod:WastepaperBasket.NAME: Wastepaper Basket
ColorfulMod:WastepaperBasket.FLAVOR: Maybe something inside is actually valuable.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the end of turn , #yretain up to #b1 card.

ColorfulMod:FlamePaint.NAME: Flame Paint
DESCRIPTIONS: The Strengthen Effect of Red increases from #b+2 to #b+3 .

ColorfulMod:MiniRainbow.NAME: Mini Rainbow
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you play a #rRed , #gGreen , #yGold card in a turn , gain #b2 #yStrength.

ColorfulMod:MarkOfChaos.NAME: Mark Of Chaos
ColorfulMod:MarkOfChaos.FLAVOR: You can't identify the color of objects anymore.
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you add color to a card , add a random color. At start of turn, set #b2 random card in hand to random color.
